text: "Your New Cuckoo" is a song from The Cardigans' third studio album, First Band on the Moon. Released in August 1997, the song reached number 35 on the UK Singles Chart the same month. ==Formats and track listings== "Your New Cuckoo", "Lovefool", "Losers", "Been It" and "Hey! Get Out of My Way" written by Nina Persson and Peter Svensson; "Country Hell", "I Figured Out", "After All", "Rise and Shine" and "Sick and Tired" written by Magnus Sveningsson and Svensson; "Carnival" written by Persson, Sveningsson and Svensson. * EU CD single # "Your New Cuckoo" – 3:30 # "Country Hell" – 2:47 * Australian CD single / EU maxi-single 1 # "Your New Cuckoo" – 3:30 # "Your New Cuckoo" – 9:29 # "Your New Cuckoo" – 3:54 # "Country Hell" – 2:47 * EU maxi-single 2 # "Your New Cuckoo" – 3:30 # "Country Hell" – 2:47 # "I Figured Out" – 2:04 # "After All" – 2:36 * Swedish 12" vinyl # "Your New Cuckoo" – 9:29 # "Your New Cuckoo" – 3:54 # "Your New Cuckoo" – 3:30 * UK CD1 # "Your New Cuckoo" – 3:30 # "Your New Cuckoo" – 9:29 # "Your New Cuckoo" – 3:54 * UK CD2 # "Your New Cuckoo" – 3:30 # "I Figured Out" – 2:04 # "After All" – 2:36 # "Lovefool" – 3:17 * Japanese promo CD # "Your New Cuckoo" – 3:32 # "Losers" – 3:15 # "Been It" – 3:40 * Japanese 7" vinyl # "Your New Cuckoo" # "Carnival" # "Rise and Shine" # "Hey! Get Out of My Way" # "Sick & Tired" ==Credits and personnel== Credits adapted from the liner notes of First Band on the Moon. Musicians * Nina Persson – lead vocals * Peter Svensson – guitar * Magnus Sveningsson – bass * Lars-Olof Johansson – keyboards * Bengt Lagerberg – drums and percussion Additional musicians and technical personnel * Åsa Håkansson – violin * Maria Holm – violin * Tore Johansson – engineering and production * Roger Jonsson – mastering * Lynette Koyana – backing vocals * Mattias Svensson – violin * David Wilczewski – flute * Inga Zeppezauer – violin ==Charts== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" !Chart (1997) !Peak position |- |- |} ==References== ==External links== Category:1997 singles Category:Songs written by Nina Persson Category:Songs written by Peter Svensson Category:1996 songs Category:The Cardigans songs Category:Stockholm Records singles Category:Mercury Records singles
